titleStmt.title: Sanskrit Manuscripts in the Bodleian Libraries

msContents.summary: An incomplete paper manuscript of Gaṅgeśa's Tattvacintāmaṇi. Pratyakṣa.

supportDesc.condition: Incomplete, in good conditions: extant folios 1-12, (loss of text), 14-111.

history.provenance:
Donated by
Shum Shere, Chandra Mahārāja Chandra Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana in 1909.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

monogr.title: Index Catalogue of MSS. Chandra Shum Shere by T. Gambier Parry. Revised and Completed by E. H. Johnston [unpublished handlist]

category.catDesc: General teaching on ethics and particular ethical topics
Narrative literature relating to the Jinas, early Jain teachers, and individual characters

change.persName: Camillo Formigatti modified this entry according to the https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bodleian/consolidated-tei-schema/master/msdesc.rng

revisionDesc.change: Camillo Formigatti created this entry, based on the unpublished catalogue entry by Gérard Colas.
